subject: PipelineHQ demo follow-up – next steps for StarkIndustries
body:
Hi Maria,

Thanks for the lively discussion about pipeline hygiene at StarkIndustries. Attaching a custom ROI model based on the 1,200 opportunities / month you mentioned.

Next steps:
• Field mapping workshop – StarkIndustries RevOps + PipelineHQ CSM (45 min)
• 14-day trial workspace provisioned upon signed DPA

Let me know which slots next week work best.

Best,
Adrien

subject: PipelineHQ Seed progress – 66k MRR & AI Coach GA
body:
Hi there,

Quick update as we prep for Series A: MRR just crossed $66k (+26% MoM) and AI Coach is now GA (3,800 weekly active deals nudged).

Attaching the latest metrics deck – happy to dive deeper if this aligns with your enterprise SaaS thesis.

Cheers,
Adrien

subject: PipelineHQ – VP Sales opportunity & culture primer
body:
Hi Sarah,

Loved your open-source work on revenue dashboards. We’re building the AI copilot for every AE and need a VP Sales who can own zero-to-one experiences.

Culture TL;DR: async-first, small senior team (10 ppl), customer-obsessed.

If that sparks joy, let’s schedule a 25-min founder chat.

Best,
Adrien

subject: Weekly update #85.6
body:
Team,

Wins:
• Closed-won Umbrella expansion (+$27k ARR)
• Latency P95 down from 7.2 → 4.3 s

Focus next week: finish forecast API v1 and launch PH blog post.

– Adrien

subject: Board prep – metric deep-dives request #429
body:
Hi board,

Ahead of next month’s meeting, let me know if you’d like additional detail on churn cohorts or AI infra spend. Deck draft will circulate two weeks prior.

Regards,
Adrien
